# Change Log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See Conventional Commitsopen in new window for commit guidelines.

# 2.0.0-beta.22open in new window (2021-07-11)

Note: Version bump only for package @vuepress/core

# 2.0.0-beta.21open in new window (2021-07-03)

Note: Version bump only for package @vuepress/core

# 2.0.0-beta.20open in new window (2021-06-26)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: invoke extendsPageOptions hook in createPage (76292aaopen in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: extendsPageOptions now accept page options as the first argument

# 2.0.0-beta.19open in new window (2021-06-19)

Note: Version bump only for package @vuepress/core

# 2.0.0-beta.18open in new window (2021-06-12)

# Code Refactoring

  • core: drop support for plugin nesting (f7da97fopen in new window)
  • core: resolve page title from markdown env (09d08a4open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: a plugin cannot use other plugins anymore
  • core: markdown emoji syntax is not supported in frontmatter title

# 2.0.0-beta.17open in new window (2021-06-04)

# Features

  • core: support multi-level theme inheritance (5df8662open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: app.themeApi is removed

# 2.0.0-beta.15open in new window (2021-05-27)

Note: Version bump only for package @vuepress/core

# 2.0.0-beta.14open in new window (2021-05-12)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: avoid mutating theme layouts array (fe27a57open in new window)

# Features

  • core: allow alias and define hook to return a promise (3b3d289open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.13open in new window (2021-05-06)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: path of page options should have the highest priority (0fc6fd3open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.12open in new window (2021-04-30)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: avoid uri encoded filename (4ff7f3bopen in new window)

# Features

  • core: add deps to page object (83c9aaeopen in new window)
  • core: make filePath available in markdown env (aa52549open in new window)

# Performance Improvements

  • core: reduce page data and component file size (4c6eea5open in new window)
  • core: reduce routes file size (d926a17open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: pagePath prop of <Content> renamed to pageKey

# 2.0.0-beta.11open in new window (2021-04-28)

# Performance Improvements

  • core: merge page routes to reduce requests in vite dev (fa2a614open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.10open in new window (2021-04-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: allow extendsMarkdown to return a promise (a4be2fdopen in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.9open in new window (2021-04-21)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: allow plugin itself as an item of plugin config array (1fa8903open in new window)
  • core: ensure trailing slash of page path (close #114open in new window) (cbcf166open in new window)

# Code Refactoring

  • core: move evergreen option to bundler-webpack (58c30c1open in new window)

# Features

  • core: make frontmatter available in markdown env (f977192open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: evergreen option is moved to bundlerConfig.evergreen for bundler-webpack

# 2.0.0-beta.8open in new window (2021-04-11)

# Code Refactoring

  • core: resolve theme when creating app (fa683cbopen in new window)

# Features

  • utils: add logger.createError method (0c198d7open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: theme plugins could be overridden by user plugins now

# 2.0.0-beta.7open in new window (2021-04-09)

# Features

  • core: show warning when duplicate plugins are detected (742f581open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.6open in new window (2021-03-26)

Note: Version bump only for package @vuepress/core

# 2.0.0-alpha.25open in new window (2021-02-20)

# Code Refactoring

  • core: remove theme data from site data (187aef3open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: themeConfig is not available in site data any more

# 2.0.0-alpha.24open in new window (2021-02-13)

# Code Refactoring

  • core: change page default date to 0000-00-00 (1ce602eopen in new window)
  • core: remove permalink and pattern from page options (9534989open in new window)

# Features

  • core: add extendsPageOptions hook (19b7e83open in new window)
  • core: add watchers parameter to onWatched hook (0bcd594open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • core: remove permalink and pattern from page options
  • core: change page default date from 1970-01-01 to 0000-00-00

# 2.0.0-alpha.1 (2020-12-01)

# Bug Fixes

  • core: default value of base and lang (5a5df27open in new window)
  • core: infer page locale path correctly (8f2b10bopen in new window)
  • core: resolve page date (bd627d7open in new window)
  • core: resolve page excerpt with correct markdown env (e0f4066open in new window)
  • core: resolve page title from markdown content as fallback (b216012open in new window)
  • core: resolve plugin and theme by name (3031324open in new window)
  • core: respect page options (d8dbbb7open in new window)

# Features

  • core: add 404 page if not exist (0297a9eopen in new window)
  • core: add clientAppRootComponentFiles hook (7f640c8open in new window)
  • core: add extendsPageData hook (5a10994open in new window)
  • core: add pagePatterns option (9a8855dopen in new window)
  • core: add public directory config (1b52ffeopen in new window)
  • core: add theme layouts option (bf96cc3open in new window)
  • core: allow disable prefetch and preload links (2991b6aopen in new window)
  • core: allow plugins and themes use export default (874979dopen in new window)
  • core: enable evergreen option by default (fa67dbbopen in new window)
  • core: export LocaleConfig type from shared (04de925open in new window)
  • core: inject page title into route meta (0d9e7e3open in new window)
  • core: remove plugins from app options (fe411e7open in new window)
  • core: remove webpack related hooks (9613f69open in new window)
